inclusion.criterion: Consent to participation in the trial and to HIV testing
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient has a stable home address within easy reach of the treatment facility
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: likely to remain there for the next 18 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pre-menopausal women must be using a barrier form of contraception or be surgically sterilised or have an Intrauterine Contraceptive Device (IUCD) in place for the duration of the treatment phase
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with rifampicin resistance identified by GeneXpert or by direct susceptibility testing
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Has any condition that may prove fatal during the study period
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Has pre-existing non-tuberculous disease likely to prejudice the response to, or assessment of, treatment e.g. insulin-dependent diabetes, liver or kidney disease, blood disorders, peripheral neuritis, and severe thrombocytopenia, rash, increase of bilirubin and other diseases that are likely to be contraindicated with rifampicin
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Is female and known to be pregnant, or breast feeding
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Is suffering from a condition likely to lead to uncooperative behaviour such as psychiatric illness or alcoholism
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Has contraindications to any medications in the study regimens
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a stable home address within easy reach of the treatment facility and is likely to remain there for the next 18 months. However, they are HIV positive which may lead to uncooperative behaviour.
